title: LogiMAT India 2026
description:
LogiMAT India 2026 is gearing up to welcome 350+ global and Indian brands to the warehousing & logistics hub of India!

As the country’s definitive intralogistics platform, LogiMAT India brings together key public and private sector stakeholders to drive meaningful dialogue and spotlight breakthrough innovations shaping the future of warehousing, material handling, and supply chain operations.

The 3rd edition, scheduled from 5–7 February 2026 at Bombay Exhibition Centre, NESCO, Mumbai, promises an enriched and future-focused experience for attendees looking to stay ahead of India’s rapidly evolving logistics landscape. The show is organised by Messe Stuttgart India, with MHE Bazar as the Digital Strategic Partner.

Get ready for a bigger, smarter, and more impactful LogiMAT India 2026.
organizerInfo: Messe Stuttgart India is one of the leading trade fair organisers in the country. In a short span, they’ve built a strong presence through exceptional events, driven by a clear mission to bring global exhibition standards to India and support the country’s economic progress by connecting businesses and inspiring growth.

blogs.author: MHE Bazar Team
blogs.description: LogiMAT India 2026 will bring together 350+ global brands, 1,000+ innovative solutions, and 12,000+ industry professionals in Mumbai from February 5–7, 2026. Discover the latest advancements in warehousing and intralogistics technology.

title: India Warehousing & Logistics Show 2025 (IWLS)
description: Attend the India Warehousing & Logistics Show 2025 (IWLS), Western & Southern India's only platform to display complete warehousing and logistics solutions. The event is co-located with the India Cold Chain Show and features the Cold Chain Conclave on November 20, 2025. This premier industry gathering is organised by RX and is the ideal place to explore cutting-edge material handling, automation, and supply chain technology.
organizerInfo: The India Warehousing & Logistics Show (IWLS) is organised by RX (Reed Exhibitions), a leading global events organizer. IWLS is recognized as Western & Southern India's only dedicated platform for warehousing and logistics solutions. The show is co-located with the India Cold Chain Show, featuring the Cold Chain Conclave. SOTI is the Title Partner for the India Warehousing & Logistics Show.

title: Intralogistics & Warehousing Expo 2025
description: Be Part of India Warehousing & Logistics Expo 2025 – Bengaluru's Biggest Industry Gathering! Experience cutting-edge Material Handling and Logistics solutions, meet top manufacturers, and drive business growth with MHE Bazar at IW Expo Bengaluru 2025. This premier event brings together industry leaders to showcase the future of intralogistics, automation, and supply chain technology.
organizerInfo: MHE Bazar, India’s trusted marketplace for Material Handling Equipment (MHE), actively participates in and hosts key industry events, trade fairs, and technology showcases across the country. These platforms allow us to highlight our latest innovations in forklifts, stackers, lithium-ion conversion kits, and energy-efficient warehouse solutions. As part of Greentech India Material Handling LLP, MHE Bazar is committed to driving India’s transition toward sustainable and smart material handling operations, aligning with the nation’s vision for net-zero emissions by 2070. Through our presence at these events, we connect with manufacturers, distributors, and logistics professionals—demonstrating how our digital platform simplifies the buying, selling, and renting of new or used equipment. We’re proud to announce that MHE Bazar is the official eCommerce Partner for this Expo. Visit us at Booth No. A-41 to explore the future of material handling technology and discover opportunities to build meaningful industry partnerships.
